    Method Description
    org.kie.api.internal.assembler.KieAssemblers.addResource​(Object, Resource, ResourceType, ResourceConfiguration)
    As of version 7.51.0 replaced by KieAssemblers.addResourceAfterRules(Object, Resource, ResourceType, ResourceConfiguration)
    org.kie.api.internal.assembler.KieAssemblers.addResources​(Object, List<ResourceWithConfiguration>, ResourceType)
    As of version 7.51.0 replaced by KieAssemblers.addResourcesAfterRules(Object, List, ResourceType)
    org.kie.api.internal.assembler.KieAssemblerService.addResource​(Object, Resource, ResourceType, ResourceConfiguration)
    As of version 7.51.0 replaced by KieAssemblerService.addResourceAfterRules(Object, Resource, ResourceType, ResourceConfiguration)
    org.kie.api.internal.assembler.KieAssemblerService.addResources​(Object, Collection<ResourceWithConfiguration>, ResourceType)
    As of version 7.51.0 replaced by KieAssemblerService.addResourcesAfterRules(Object, Collection, ResourceType)
    org.kie.api.KieServices.newKieBaseConfiguration​(Properties, ClassLoader)
    The classLoader has to be defined when creating the KieContainer, so the one passed here will be just ignored
